summary: During the 1860s in the South Pacific, Capt. Ralls, skipper of the Red Witch, has a series of adventures involving sunken gold bullion, pearls, natives, an unscrupulous ship owner and a giant octopus.
cast: John Wayne|Gail Russell|Gig Young|Adele Mara|Luther Adler|Eduard Franz|Grant Withers|Henry Daniell|Paul Fix|Dennis Hoey|Jeff Corey|Erskine Sanford|Duke Kahanamoku|Fred Aldrich|Fernando Alvarado|Jose Alvarado|George Barrows|Henry Brandon|David Clarke|Jimmy Dime|Fred Fox|Fred Graham|Vic Groves|Myron Healey|Mailoa Kalili|Al Kikume|Fred Libby|Harold Lishman|Rory Mallinson|Grant Means|Frank Mills|Forbes Murray|James Nolan|Frank O'Connor|John Pickard|George Piltz|Norman Rainey|Leo C.
